mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{author}, #{title}, #{content}, #{ip}, 0, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, BOARD_SEQ.CURRVAL, 0, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD ORDER BY GROUPNO DESC, DEPTH ASC, GROUPORD DESC) A ) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET GROUPORD = GROUPORD + 1 WHERE GROUPNO = ${groupno} AND DEPTH = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{author}, #{title}, #{content}, #{ip}, 0, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, ${groupno}, ${groupord}, ${depth} )
